title: CashPrice
description: Specifies the nature of a cash price either as a fee type, cash price type, or premium expression.

cashPriceType.description: Specifies the type of Cash Price.

premiumExpression.description: Specifies a premium when expressed in a way other than an amount, and any required forward starting price definition.

feeType.description: Specifies the event type associated with a fee.
